content: crochet tiny dog snuggler has instructions to crochet 3 breeds of dogs - poodle mix golden retriever and dachshund these tiny snugglers are quick to make and are perfect for little hands to hold and carry making them perfect companions for playground adventures they are fantastic for craft fairs and markets too finished size my finished size using super bulky yarn and 6 5 mm crochet hook was 6 25 inches tall and 3 inches wide gauge not critical materials yarn super bulky yarn i used bernat blanket yarn you can substitute any bulky/super bulky yarn for this pattern and go down 1- 2 hook sizes from yarn recommendation hook 6 5 mm crochet hook stitch markers scissors yarn needle black yarn and needle polyester fiberfill 12 mm safety eyes optional safety nose optional
